events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return it because the item does not match the description and I need a refund.
The support system categorized this issue under Refund based on customer mention of return and refund request.
The case has been assigned to support agent Maria to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return your order and get a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and explain the reason for the return in more detail? This will help us process your refund faster.
Sure, my order number is 123456. I want to return because the item looks different in person and the size is smaller than advertised.
Thank you for the details. We can arrange a return shipment for you at no cost and once we receive the item, we will process your full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick help and free return shipping. Please send me the return label when possible.
I have sent the return label to your email address. Please use it to send the product back. Let us know if you need further assistance.
We just wanted to check if you were able to return your item and if everything went smoothly with the refund process.
The refund process has been successfully completed and the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
